pages.text: While Factories cannot grow in stage themselves on their own, they can upgrade other parasites akin to a Stage IV Beckon.$(br2)When placed near a viable parasite, said parasite can be upgraded into a stronger form, such as a Rupter into a Mangler.

This process, however, is not free. Vagrants must provide the necessary biomass themselves, storing it inside beforehand. The Factory must be a higher Tier than that of the parasite which is produced, however, so only a Tier 2 Factory can upgrade Assimilated versions into Ferals.
$(#630000)Doing this with an Assimilated Tier parasite was how I got my first Feral. Most Feral parasites require around 25 biomass, so I should expect to need that much to obtain one.
$(#630000)Once I do have a Factory bound to the output, I can use it on the parasite it upgraded from to do it instead.
